content.rendered:
Directed by Pawan Kripalani

Written by Pawan Kripalani. Pooja Ladha Surti. Sumit Batheja. Anuvab Pal. Devashish Makhija. Sumit Batheja. Pooja Ladha Surti. Pawan Kripalani

Cast Saif Ali Khan(Vibhooti). Arjun Kapoor(Chiraunji). Jacqueline Fernandez(Kanika). Yami Gautam(Maya). Jaaved Jaaferi(Inspector Chedilal (as Javed Jaafery)). Rajpal Naurang Yadav(Goggal Baba (as Rajpal Yadav)). Amit Mistry(GM Hari Kumar). Girish Kulkarni(Santu). Saurabh Sachdeva(Ullat Baba). Jamie Lever(Lata). Rupesh Tillu(Vinod). Yashaswini Dayama(Guddi). Faezeh Jalali(Manju). Youngyka Dolma(Titli). Kalsang Dolma(Titli’s Mother). Ravi Solanki(Kichkandi). J.P. Chopra(Guddi’s Father (as J P Chopra)). Archana Kelkar(Guddi’s Mother).Aziza Khamraeva. Alexx O’Nell((as Alex O’Neil)).Manmohan Saxena.John.Andrew. Nehpal Gautam(Tout).Girish Yadav.Hari Narayan Sharma. Azzy Bagria(Village Boy (as Bagria Azzy)). Archana Kelkar Deshmukh(Guddi’s Mother). Satkeer(Satish).Sujeet Kumar Sharma.Chobber Sidhu.Abhinay Raj Singh. Mayank Gola(Chacha (uncredited))

Languages Hindi

Producers Radhika Joshi. Pankaj Nahal. Akshai Puri. Kapil Sethi. Prakash Talreja. Jaya Taurani. Ramesh Sadhuram Taurani. Varsha Taurani. Akhilesh Yadav.

Production 12th Street Entertainment. Tips Industries.
